summary: The Student Visa Integrity Act of 2025 aims to overhaul student and exchange visitor visa programs. Key provisions include increased criminal penalties for visa fraud, mandatory accreditation for academic institutions, revised reporting requirements for schools, stricter eligibility reviews for officials, limitations on online study, denial of visas for nationals from countries of concern for specific types of training, and requirements for a definite end date for authorized stay. The bill also mandates the modernization of the Student and Exchange Visitor Information System (SEVIS II) and requires a GAO report on implementation.
